data.title: Mobile devices and smartphones
data.meta_description: Enhance every mobile device design with the right semiconductor solutions from Infineon – your mobile device partner. Learn more now.
data.text:
Mobile devices are at the heart of the internet of things (IoT), creating ubiquitous connectivity among other devices, people and data. This exciting market is one of the largest worldwide in terms of volume and number of applications on a single platform, for example, smartphones.

Infineon offers a wide range of compact and best-in-class RF ICs for cellular RF Frontends, complementary wireless functions, as well as interface protection. For a safer end-user experience, we offer high-quality semiconductor solutions for battery and accessory designs and security solutions for data protection. Explore XENSIV™ MEMS microphones to enhance audio functionalities on mobile phones.
